articles.title: Couple swapped a grilled cheese sandwich for a painting set to now fetch over £20,000 at auction - Daily Mail
articles.description: Retired restaurateurs Irene and Tony Demas from Ontario revealed how they swapped  meals for artwork with British artist John Kinnear - and have now hit the art jackpot.
articles.content:
A 50-year-old painting by an acclaimed Canadian folk artist that was given in exchange for a grilled cheese sandwich could fetch over £20,000 at auction.
